metadata.title: CVE-2024-7538 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - high
metadata.description: oFono CUSD AT Command Stack-based Buffer Overflow Code ExecutionVulnerability. This vulnerability allows local attackers to executearbitrary code on affected installations of oFono. An attacker must firstobtain the ability to execute code on the target modem in order to exploitthis vulnerability.The specific flaw exists within the parsing of responses from AT Commands.The issue results from the lack of proper validation of the length ofuser-supplied data prior to copying it to a stack-based buffer. An attackercan leverage this vulnerability to execute code in the context of root. WasZDI-CAN-23190.

criterions.comment: ofono package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
